meanings.sent1: The school play was a big happening in our town.
meanings.sent2: The wedding was a beautiful happening that brought everyone together.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was a happening that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The concert was a happening that lit up the night.
meanings.sent5: The parade was a happening that filled the streets with joy.

meanings.definition: Currently taking place or in progress.
meanings.sent1: The happening party was full of laughter and music.
meanings.sent2: The happening storm caused a lot of excitement in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The happening game kept us on the edge of our seats.
meanings.sent4: The happening market was bustling with activity.
meanings.sent5: The happening festival was a lively celebration of culture.

meanings.definition: A fashionable or popular event or activity.
meanings.sent1: The music festival was the happening spot to be this weekend.
meanings.sent2: The new restaurant in town became the happening place for locals.
meanings.sent3: The dance club was the happening scene for all the young people.
meanings.sent4: The art exhibit was the happening event for art enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show was the happening event of the season.
